thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value for money
thread.title_full: Good value for money - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lapidot
title: Good value for money
text:
Hotel is located ten to fifteen minutes walk from the Opera
nice small lobby with a pleasant atmosphere
very small bed in the room
shower is located in the tub and there is no door or full cover, so after a shower the whole bathroom is totally wet
nice breakfast
For the money the hotel charges, it is a good deal
